queries.query: SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iConnectionUserId` IN('24') AND `iUserId` IN('22')

SELECT `usc`.`iConnectionId` AS `conn_id`,`usc`.`eConnectionType` AS `conn_type`,`usc`.`eConnectionResult` AS `conn_result` FROM `user_connections` AS `usc` WHERE `iUserId` IN('24') AND `iConnectionUserId` IN('22')
UPDATE `user_connections` SET `dtUpdatedAt` = NOW(), `eConnectionType` = 'Like' WHERE `iConnectionId` = '279' AND `eStatus` IN('Active')

SELECT `s`.`iUserId` AS `s_users_id`,`r`.`iUserId` AS `r_users_id`,`r`.`vDeviceToken` AS `r_device_token`,`r`.`eIsSubscribed` AS `r_premium_status`,CONCAT(s.vFirstName," ",s.vLastName) AS s_name FROM `user_connections` AS `uc` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `s` ON `uc`.`iUserId` = `s`.`iUserId` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `r` ON `uc`.`iConnectionUserId`  = `r`.`iUserId` WHERE (uc.iUserId = 22 AND uc.iConnectionUserId = 24)  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `notification` (`vNotificationMessage`, `iNotifierId`, `eNotificationType`, `dtAddedAt`, `dtUpdatedAt`, `eNotificationStatus`, `iUserId`) VALUES ('Gayatri Apple wants to collab with you', '24', 'Like', NOW(), NOW(), 'Active', '22')
SELECT `ui`.`vProfileImage` AS `ui_image`,`ui`.`iUserId` AS `ui_users_id` FROM `users` AS `ui` WHERE `ui`.`iUserId` = '22'  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `mod_push_notifications` (`vUniqueId`, `vDeviceId`, `eMode`, `eNotifyCode`, `vSound`, `vBadge`, `vTitle`, `tMessage`, `tVarsJSON`, `eDeviceType`, `dtAddDateTime`, `tSendJSON`, `dtExeDateTime`, `tError`, `eStatus`) VALUES ('6e22a', 'Error:A55B97F9-AB75-42B3-824B-20B593FC2DF2', 'live', 'USER', '', 0, '', 'Gayatri Apple wants to collab with you', '[{\"key\":\"type\",\"value\":\"Like\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"receiver_id\",\"value\":\"24\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_id\",\"value\":\"22\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_name\",\"value\":\"Gayatri Apple\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_profile\",\"value\":null,\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_image\",\"value\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\",\"send\":\"Yes\"}]', 'iOS', '2020-11-11 07:17:55', '{\"aps\":{\"badge\":0,\"sound\":\"received.caf\",\"alert\":{\"body\":\"Gayatri Apple wants to collab with you\"}},\"code\":\"USER\",\"id\":\"6e22a\",\"type\":\"Like\",\"receiver_id\":\"24\",\"user_id\":\"22\",\"user_name\":\"Gayatri Apple\",\"user_profile\":\"\",\"user_image\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\"}', '2020-11-11 07:17:55', 'Faliure while stream socket connection..!', 'Failed')
